TitleEnglish: Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf 4
SummaryEnglish: In the film, Weslie and his crew discover an evil mechanical dragon who defeats Wolffy as he was attempting to capture the goats, but a series of good dragons rescue Weslie and the goats. The good dragons say that evil dragons have taken over their world, and they need the help of the goats.
Aliases: Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf - Mission Incredible: Adventures on the Dragon's Trail
